wikipedia_page.main: Jon Morgan Searle (22 June 1930 - 13 March 2012) was a Gibraltarian journalist and editor of the Gibraltar Chronicle. He was also correspondent for the news agency Reuters and The Times of London.

response: Dominique Searle, MBE, (2 April 1960) is a Gibraltarian journalist, son of the also journalist Jon Morgan Searle. Editor of the Gibraltar Chronicle, he is married and has three children.
